blog.name: shinonart
blog.title: Shinon's art blog
blog.description:
Hello, I'm Shinon! I'm an artist from Finland and I work in both digital and traditional media. I use both digital and traditional media and I specialize in creature and fantasy illustration.
For inquiries contact me at: shinoncommissions@gmail.com
Please do not repost my art unless given permission by me, thank you.

title: Question: Pokemon Reimagined: Watercolour Works?
body:
ey guys! I have a small question for you. Some of you may be familiar with my “Pokémon Reimagined” -series and are aware that I have made two books full of my realistic Pokémon illustrations! 

You may also have noticed my Pokeddex series which is basically the same concept but the Pokémon are done traditionally in watercolours. In previous cons I have had many people ask me if there were printed versions of the paintings - or even a book. Due to the massive amount of paintings I haven’t printed them. I have only sold the originals. I have been juggling with the idea of putting my watercolour paintings together into a book as well but so far I haven’t figured out what the format would be.

I have two ideas: gathering the images into one book or making smaller, yearly zines. The big book would have 60+ pages and I would gather the Pokemon together in collages according to the categories they were drawn in. Here’s an example of such collage (full spread of a square format book):

The yearly zines would not only be more cost effective but it would also be easier to continue the series. I would probably still go with a square format so the zines fit the main series but I will need to look into the cost of it. I might also be able to include a small flavour text for each design, explaining what I based them on, just as with my main Pokemon Reimagined series. Here’s an example page of a yearly zine (all watermarks etc. would be removed for printed versions):

I’m currently leaning towards the zine option for various reasons but I wanted to hear your thoughts if you have any! I’m planning to get these done by next summer and con season!

summary: to me Ash is a bit of a blank slate protag, he doesn’t need to develop as a character bc ultimately he exists as a focus point...
body: to me Ash is a bit of a blank slate protag, he doesn’t need to develop as a character bc ultimately he exists as a focus point on the story of the entire pokemon universe. the story was never about him, the story isn’t about Ash it’s about the world he lives in.

reblog.comment: to me Ash is a bit of a blank slate protag, he doesn’t need to develop as a character bc ultimately he exists as a focus point on the story of the entire pokemon universe. the story was never about him, the story isn’t about Ash it’s about the world he lives in.

trail.content_raw: to me Ash is a bit of a blank slate protag, he doesn’t need to develop as a character bc ultimately he exists as a focus point on the story of the entire pokemon universe. the story was never about him, the story isn’t about Ash it’s about the world he lives in.
trail.content: to me Ash is a bit of a blank slate protag, he doesn’t need to develop as a character bc ultimately he exists as a focus point on the story of the entire pokemon universe. the story was never about him, the story isn’t about Ash it’s about the world he lives in.

title: Oddish - 43
body:
During the daytime, Oddish buries itself in soil to absorb nutrients from the ground using its entire body. The more fertile the soil, the glossier its leaves become.

- Pokemon Ruby, Omega Ruby

blog.name: lucia-nanami
blog.title: Time is on No One's Side
blog.description: You're always either a hero or a villain in someone else's story.  In the end, only you know who you are.  Life's too short to waste time worrying about what other people think of you.

summary: Pokémon Mnemonics KEY > = Super effective against < = Weak to ≠ = No effect 1/2 effect = Not very effective Fight is might...
body:
Pokémon Mnemonics

KEY
> = Super effective against
< = Weak to
≠ = No effect
½ effect = Not very effective

Fight is might (Normal < Fighting)
Brain over brawn (Psychic > Fighting)
Throw some water on that campfire- (Water > Fire)
Killer fashion (Fairy > Dragon)
Forest fires (Grass < Fire)
Mental healing purges (Poison < Psychic)
Logic trumps supernatural (Psychic > Ghost)
You can’t slap a ghost- (Normal ≠ Ghost)
Fear is logic’s enemy (Psychic ≠ Dark)
Reptiles are cold-blooded (Ice > Dragon)
Water is a conductor (Water < Electric)
Electricity always goes for the ground (Ground > Electric)
They can’t fight if airborne- (Flying > Fighting)
Scurry from the flames! (Bug < Fire)
Dirt can suffocate (Fire < Ground)
Melt da metal- (Fire > Steel)
Oh, the irony- (Steel > Fairy)
Erosion (Rock < Water)
Determined grass beats pavement (Grass > Rock)
This is why we have pesticides… (Bug > Grass)
If electrocuted, birds die (Electric > Flying)
Two birds with one stone (Flying < Rock)
Bugs are a good source of protein (Flying > Bug)
Trust no one, not even yourself (Dragon < Dragon)
Have you forgotten that I breathe fire- (Fire ½ effect Dragon)
Scissors may not beat rock, bUT A SWORD CAN- (Steel > Rock)
Oh, thank you for the drink! (Water ½ effect Grass)
I drink you to live- (Grass > Water)
How else are you supposed to make ice sculptures- (Steel > Ice)
Bitch, I MADE YOU (Ground > Steel)
Anything is punchable if you try hard enough (Fighting > Steel)
You may have muscles, but you still can’t slap a ghost- (Fighting ≠ Ghost)

This is a work in progress and any that others want added will be edited into the main post.

Bugs are a good source of protein (Flying > Bug)
Trust no one, not even yourself (Dragon < Dragon)
Have you forgotten that I breathe fire- (Fire ½ effect Dragon)
Scissors may not beat rock, bUT A SWORD CAN- (Steel > Rock)
Oh, thank you for the drink! (Water ½ effect Grass)
I drink you to live- (Grass > Water)
How else are you supposed to make ice sculptures- (Steel > Ice)
Bitch, I MADE YOU (Ground > Steel)
Anything is punchable if you try hard enough (Fighting > Steel)
You may have muscles, but you still can’t slap a ghost- (Fighting ≠ Ghost)

This is a work in progress and any that others want added will be edited into the main post.

blog.name: thismutedromance
blog.title: Let's Try This Again
blog.description: Back for the first damn time

reblog.comment: “What a wonderful world.”

trail.content_raw: “What a wonderful world.”
trail.content: “What a wonderful world.”

blog.name: sirblackaxe
blog.title: Today is a good day for S!CIENCE!!!

summary:
I've finally cracked open my copy of Pokemon Ultra Moon, and man, I'm conflicted.
On one hand, part of the fun of playing a new...
body:
I’ve finally cracked open my copy of Pokemon Ultra Moon, and man, I’m conflicted.

On one hand, part of the fun of playing a new gen is using pokemon you’ve never seen before.

On the other hand, with Poplio, Furfrou, Growlithe, and Rockruff* all available early I’ve got a genuine shot at an all puppy playthrough.

*I haven’t actually found a wild Rockruff yet, maybe it’s gated behind Rock Smash?
